title: The Red Shield - Black Dyke Band - Emblem of The Salvation Army

story.text:
YOUTUBE 2G5siMgohzw
The Red Shield - Band March
This is "The Red Shield" performed by The Black Dyke Band. It is taken from their album 'World Class Marches of the Salvation Army - Volume I' which features many great band marches.
Further volumes were recorded and released by the Black Dyke Band.
This march was intended for street parades and open air.
It was written in 1928 and the title refers to the worldly recognised Red Shield logo of the Salvation Army.
